description: Our Deluxe Room is a spacious and comfortable retreat, perfect for relaxation. With 400 sq ft of space, it offers modern amenities and a cozy atmosphere. Enjoy a special 20% discount for stays longer than 3 nights.
special_offer: 20% off for stays longer than 3 nights!

description: Indulge in luxury with our Executive Suite, offering a 600 sq ft space with a stunning city view and top-tier amenities. Enjoy a special offer of complimentary breakfast included with all bookings.
special_offer: Complimentary breakfast included for all bookings!

description: Our Family Suite provides 800 sq ft of space, separate bedrooms, and a kitchenette for families. Kids stay for free with two paying adults.
special_offer: Kids stay for free with two paying adults!

description: Our comfortable Standard Room offers 300 sq ft of space with basic amenities. Enjoy a weekend getaway special with 10% off on Fridays and Saturdays.
special_offer: Weekend getaway special: 10% off on Fridays and Saturdays!

description: Experience opulence in our Luxury Suite, offering 1000 sq ft of space with top-tier amenities and a private jacuzzi. Enjoy a complimentary spa treatment with every booking.
special_offer: Complimentary spa treatment with every booking!

description: Our cozy Single Room is ideal for solo travelers, offering 200 sq ft of space. Enjoy a special offer of staying 3 nights and getting the 4th night free.
special_offer: Stay 3 nights, get the 4th night free!

description: Our romantic Honeymoon Suite offers 700 sq ft of space with a private balcony and champagne on arrival. Enjoy a special offer of complimentary rose petals and candles for your special night.
special_offer: Complimentary rose petals and candles for your special night!

description: Our lavish Penthouse Suite offers 1200 sq ft of space with panoramic city views and a private rooftop terrace. Enjoy exclusive access to the rooftop lounge during your stay.
special_offer: Exclusive access to the rooftop lounge during your stay!

description: Our luxurious Beachfront Villa offers 1500 sq ft of space with direct beach access and a private pool. Enjoy a special offer of complimentary beachfront dining experience for all guests.
special_offer: Complimentary beachfront dining experience for all guests!

description: Our economical and comfortable Economy Room is perfect for budget-conscious travelers. Enjoy 250 sq ft of space and a special offer of staying 5 nights and getting 1 night free.

Indulge in the serenity of our Beachfront Bungalow, a cozy haven offering breathtaking sea views and direct access to the beach. With a generous 600 square feet of space, this bungalow is perfect for a romantic getaway or a peaceful retreat.
special_offer: Complimentary snorkeling equipment for an underwater adventure!

description: Escape to our Mountain View Cabin, a rustic hideaway with awe-inspiring mountain vistas and a cozy fireplace. This 350-square-foot cabin offers a serene retreat in the heart of nature.
special_offer: Enjoy a complimentary guided hike in the nearby wilderness!

description: Discover our Hillside Retreat, a secluded oasis perched on a hillside with a private outdoor spa and lush gardens. With 800 square feet of space, this retreat offers the perfect blend of privacy and luxury.
special_offer: Complimentary wine and cheese tasting for a relaxing evening!

description: Experience the City-View Studio, a stylish and contemporary space with panoramic city views and modern amenities. With 280 square feet of space, this studio offers a cozy and convenient environment for your stay.
special_offer: Complimentary access to the rooftop bar for stunning sunsets!

description: Escape to our Garden-View Suite, a serene sanctuary with a private balcony overlooking lush green surroundings. With 500 square feet of space, this suite provides a spacious and comfortable retreat.
special_offer: Enjoy complimentary spa treatments during your stay!
